## Learning Objectives

- Identify best graph types (e.g., bar chart vs. histogram) based on variable types (e.g., categorical vs. numeric)
- Interpret what a graph shows about the data
- Practice using `ggplot2` to explore (see readings Ch.9) and communicate data (see readings Ch.10) with graphs

- ["Chapter 10 Exploratory Data Analysis"](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/eda) from "R for Data Science" 2nd Edition
